Class Cli

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserInterface
      • Cli

  • public class Cli
extends UserInterface
    CLI class The Command-Line Interfacew (CLI) is a graphical user interface that runs in the console

      • displayPage

        protected int displayPage(int pageId)
        displayPage Take the pageId and display the page Most methods (pages) check whether the entered value is an integer in range 1-19. If so, this is recognized as a pageId, and the value is returned to the displayPage method Return a page Id
        Parameters:
        pageId - int
        Returns:
        int
